Class InventorySlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.client.GUI.panels.GUIPanel
      • com.client.GUI.panels.GUIPanelMovable
        • com.client.GUI.panels.player.InventorySlot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.util.EventListener

    public final class InventorySlot
extends GUIPanelMovable
    Encapsulates an inventory slot.
    Author:
    Ian
